document.full_text: accused child killer casey anthony insisted that her daughter caylee was kidnapped by a nanny, even after admitting to detectives that everything else she had told them was a lie, according to a taped interview played for jurors thursday.
document.title: anthony insisted nanny took girl, even after admitting lies
lines_and_colors: accused child killer casey anthony insisted that her daughter caylee was kidnapped by a nanny, even after admitting to detectives that everything else she had told them was a lie, according to a taped interview played for jurors thursday.
